direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manage the lifecycle of the object, starting and shutting down the underlying stack.
Both methods modify the operational state of the object, with 'start' initializing resources and 'determineAddress' using them.
Both methods interact with the STUN server and modify the state of the object, though 'start' initializes resources and 'doTestI' uses them.
Both methods involve sending requests and waiting for responses, sharing similar control flows and exception handling.
